thread.title: French Presidential Candidate Marine Le Pen Refuses to Wear Headscarf During Lebanon Trip - WSJ
thread.title_full: French Presidential Candidate Marine Le Pen Refuses to Wear Headscarf During Lebanon Trip - WSJ

author: William Horobin
title: French Presidential Candidate Marine Le Pen Refuses to Wear Headscarf During Lebanon Trip - WSJ
text:
World French Presidential Candidate Marine Le Pen Refuses to Wear Headscarf During Lebanon Trip Country’s highest Sunni Muslim authority says politician had been informed she would need to cover her head By @WHorobin Feb. 21, 2017 12:48 p.m. ET 
PARIS—Marine Le Pen, the presidential candidate for France’s far-right National Front, seized on a trip to Lebanon to showcase her hard line on Islamic custom, refusing Tuesday to wear a headscarf and upending her plans to meet with the country’s senior Sunni Muslim cleric. 
On the final day of a three-day visit, Ms. Le Pen refused to take a headscarf before meeting with Grand Mufti Sheikh Abdel-Latif Derian at his office, saying... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Most Popular Videos
